v8:item.v8:content: Only to encrypt from Personal store…
Searching for certificates in personal storage…
Certificate is kept in the Personal store on the computer or available on the server
Certificate expires in less than 30 days
Certificate can be used only for encryption and decryption
The digital signature and encryption applications are set up in the root node
<link CheckCryptographyAppsInstallation>Click here</> to view all installed digital signing apps.
Settings of applications of digital signature and encryption which can be applied by users on their computers
Path to the application on a computer running Linux OS or macOS
Path to the application required on computers running Linux OS or macOS
How to work with digital signature and encryption applications
On saving data to the file with digital signature

Settings.QueryText: SELECT CertificatesOverridable.Ref AS Ref, CertificatesOverridable.DeletionMark AS DeletionMark, CertificatesOverridable.Description AS Description, CertificatesOverridable.IssuedTo AS IssuedTo, CertificatesOverridable.Firm AS Firm, CertificatesOverridable.LastName AS LastName, CertificatesOverridable.Name AS Name, CertificatesOverridable.MiddleName AS MiddleName, CertificatesOverridable.JobTitle AS JobTitle, CertificatesOverridable.IssuedBy AS IssuedBy, CertificatesOverridable.ValidBefore AS ValidBefore, CertificatesOverridable.Signing AS Signing, CertificatesOverridable.Encryption AS Encryption, CertificatesOverridable.Thumbprint AS Thumbprint, CertificatesOverridable.CertificateData AS CertificateData, CertificatesOverridable.Application AS Application, CertificatesOverridable.Revoked AS Revoked, CertificatesOverridable.EnterPasswordInDigitalSignatureApplication AS EnterPasswordInDigitalSignatureApplication, CertificatesOverridable.Organization AS Organization, CASE WHEN CertificatesOverridable.User = VALUE(Catalog.Users.EmptyRef) THEN " " ELSE CertificatesOverridable.User END AS User, CertificatesOverridable.Added AS Added, &AdditionalField AS RequestStatus, CertificatesOverridable.Predefined AS Predefined, CertificatesOverridable.PredefinedDataName AS PredefinedDataName, CASE WHEN CertificatesOverridable.DeletionMark THEN 1 WHEN &IsRequest THEN 5 ELSE CASE WHEN CertificatesOverridable.Thumbprint IN (&CertificatesInPersonalStorage) THEN CASE WHEN CertificatesOverridable.ValidBefore < &CurrentDate THEN 4 WHEN CertificatesOverridable.ValidBefore < DATEADD(&CurrentDate, DAY, 30) THEN 3 ELSE 2 END ELSE 0 END END AS CertificateStatusInPersonalStorage, CASE WHEN NOT CertificatesOverridable.DeletionMark AND NOT CertificatesOverridable.Revoked AND CertificatesOverridable.ValidBefore >= &CurrentDate AND CertificatesOverridable.ValidBefore <= DATEADD(&CurrentDate, DAY, 30) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS DeadlineEndsSoon, CASE WHEN NOT CertificatesOverridable.Revoked AND CertificatesOverridable.ValidBefore > &CurrentDate THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS Valid_SSLyf, CASE WHEN ProgramsOverridable.IsBuiltInCryptoProvider THEN 4 WHEN CertificatesOverridable.Application = UNDEFINED OR CertificatesOverridable.Application = VALUE(Catalog.DigitalSignatureAndEncryptionApplications.EmptyRef) OR NOT ProgramsOverridable.Ref IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 3 END + CASE WHEN CertificatesOverridable.DeletionMark THEN 4 ELSE 0 END AS LocationType FROM Catalog.DigitalSignatureAndEncryptionKeysCertificates AS CertificatesOverridable LEFT JOIN Catalog.DigitalSignatureAndEncryptionApplications AS ProgramsOverridable ON CertificatesOverridable.Application = ProgramsOverridable.Ref AND &OptionalConnection WHERE (&CertificateUser = UNDEFINED OR CertificatesOverridable.User = &CertificateUser OR CertificatesOverridable.Ref IN (SELECT DISTINCT ElectronicSignatureAndEncryptionKeyCertificatesUsersOverridable.Ref AS Ref FROM Catalog.DigitalSignatureAndEncryptionKeysCertificates.Users AS ElectronicSignatureAndEncryptionKeyCertificatesUsersOverridable WHERE ElectronicSignatureAndEncryptionKeyCertificatesUsersOverridable.User = &CertificateUser))

v8:item.v8:content: Update settings and app list with their check results
Submit an application for certificate issuance
Show a version of the installed add-in and prompt to install or update to a newer version.
Install and apply the latest add-in version and prompt to update to a newer version.
